input:
Please fix the following error in the program:
Cannot import from time, line 3: import time

Here's the current program:
from vpython import *
import time

# Constants
g = 9.8         # gravitational acceleration
Length_I = 10   # length of pendulum
theta_0 = 0.1   # initial swing angle

# Create pendulum
ceiling = box(length=0.2, height=0.01, width=0.2, color=color.blue)
ball = sphere(radius=0.05, color=color.red)
rod = cylinder(radius=0.01, color=color.yellow)
ball.m = 1     # mass of pendulum

# Animation parameters
dt = 0.01
t = 0

# Pendulum initial conditions
ball.theta = theta_0
ball.omega = 0

while True:
    rate(100)
    
    # Update pendulum position
    ball.pos = vector(Length_I*sin(ball.theta), -Length_I*cos(ball.theta), 0)
    rod.axis = ball.pos
    
    # Update pendulum motion
    alpha = -g/Length_I * sin(ball.theta)
    ball.omega += alpha*dt
    ball.theta += ball.omega*dt
    
    # Update time
    t += dt
    
    # Detect one full period
    if abs(ball.theta - theta_0) < 1E-4 and ball.omega < 0:
        print("Period: ", t, "s")
        t = 0
output:
from vpython import *

# Constants
g = 9.8         # gravitational acceleration
Length_I = 10   # length of pendulum
theta_0 = 0.1   # initial swing angle

# Create pendulum
ceiling = box(length=0.2, height=0.01, width=0.2, color=color.blue)
ball = sphere(radius=0.05, color=color.red)
rod = cylinder(radius=0.01, color=color.yellow)
ball.m = 1     # mass of pendulum

# Animation parameters
dt = 0.01
t = 0

# Pendulum initial conditions
ball.theta = theta_0
ball.omega = 0

while True:
    rate(100)
    
    # Update pendulum position
    ball.pos = vector(Length_I*sin(ball.theta), -Length_I*cos(ball.theta), 0)
    rod.axis = ball.pos
    
    # Update pendulum motion
    alpha = -g/Length_I * sin(ball.theta)
    ball.omega += alpha*dt
    ball.theta += ball.omega*dt
    
    # Update time
    t += dt
    
    # Detect one full period
    if abs(ball.theta - theta_0) < 1E-4 and ball.omega < 0:
        print("Period: ", t, "s")
        t = 0
